name: Jack the Barbarian
description: Jack the Barbarian is an Old-School RPG game. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, just explore it! Barbarians, elves, pirates... Who do you think will win?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
